war.dao

Class UserStoryDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.dao.UserStoryDao

  • @Repository
public class UserStoryDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for the user stories (Workboard and Reports)
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost

               throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
